gable.name: Gable Roof (+5%)
gable.description: Simple triangular shape formed by two sloping sides meeting at a ridge. Most cost-effective and suitable for most climates. Includes a 5% cost adjustment for complexity.
gable.bestFor: Most residential applications, budget-conscious projects, areas with moderate weather
gable.complexity: Low - Simple construction and installation with 5% cost premium

shed.name: Shed Roof
shed.description: Single sloping plane that provides modern aesthetics and excellent water runoff. Simple construction with contemporary appeal.
shed.bestFor: Modern homes, additions, excellent water drainage needs
